**Katlyn Bagley-Sepsey (she/her)**

As Director of Institutional Research, Reporting, and Data Stewardship at Furman University, Katlyn focuses on institutional data strategy, governance, and compliance. Responsibilities include aligning data systems with decision-making needs, developing and maintaining data warehousing processes, and ensuring adherence to FERPA standards. She also oversees federal and state reporting, institutional dashboards, and participation in national data exchanges.

## Code of Conduct committee

- [Ella Kaye](https://ellakaye.co.uk)
- [Katlyn Bagley-Sepsey](https://www.linkedin.com/in/katlyn-bagley-sepsey/)
- [Yo Yehudi](https://yo-yehudi.com/ )

The external, independent advisors to the Code of Conduct committee are the Fellows Management team at the [Software Sustainability Institute](https://software.ac.uk).
The primary point of contact is [Oscar Seip](https://www.software.ac.uk/our-people/oscar-seip). 
Current members of the team are listed on the [Fellowship page](https://www.software.ac.uk/programmes/fellowship-programme) of the SSI website, 
under "Meet our Team, Fellow, and Explore the Impact of the Programme" -> "Our Team".
